vis_app module

vis_app.is_int(inp)[source]

Check if the input parameter is an integer or an empty value. :param inp: input value :return: True if inp is an integer or empty value

vis_app.is_number(inp)[source]

Check if the input parameter is a float or an empty value. :param inp: input value :return: True if inp is a float or empty value
